web_snippets: Erica Schreiner ... video and performance artist ... Erica is a member of the New York Film-makers' Cooperative (est. 1961) and ...
Erica Schreiner is an experimental, feminist video and performance artist based in New York City. She shoots on VHS, while performing before the camera.
Erica Schreiner. Actress: The Special People. Erica Schreiner is known for The Special People (2021), Satori (2015) and The Skye Project (2007).
